summary:
Fields of interest:
- Patent research, EPC, PCT
- Robotics (industrial/surgical/agricultural), mechatronics,
- Mechanical systems, control, CAD/CAE
- Manipulators: geometric design, dexterity and workspace analysis, parallel vs serial manipulators
treasury_media:
[{'url': None, 'title': 'MS Thesis', 'description': 'Features:
-Geometric optimization algorithm for 7-R serial manipulators using interval analysis
-implemented in MATLAB.
-A set of designs that satisfy dexterity, obstacle avoidance and task volume requirements are found. Then they are evaluated by mass, mass distribution and geometry-based fault-tolerance indices.
Notes:
-Redundant manipulators offer high dexterity and singularity/obstacle avoidance.
-Interval analysis is more useful compared to the classical cost function optimization.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C512DAQGgksmWmzLGAQ/profile-treasury-document-cover-images_1920/0/1583262638499?e=1692936000&v=beta&t=1Kxyn452wfCYcxA3ocBzlSHQzjtdMxdjeOSEMt5N2Oc'}]
